DIA_Militia_KQ402_FIRSTWARN_03_01: Stop! You're in the wrong place here! Go away!
DIA_Militia_KQ402_SECONDWARN_03_01: I say one last time, go away!
DIA_Militia_KQ402_What_03_01: Hey, you, what are you looking for?!
DIA_Militia_KQ402_What_03_03: He's a friend of mine. I told him to wait.
DIA_Militia_KQ402_What_03_04: But I'm in no hurry. He's new, so will wait.
DIA_Militia_KQ402_What_03_05: That's the kind of approach to freshmen that I understand!
DIA_Militia_KQ402_CheckArmor_03_02: If you're looking for Arwid, he's not here.
DIA_Militia_KQ402_CheckArmor_15_03: I'm not here because of that. Roderich has ordered me to inspect the equipment you brought for us.
DIA_Militia_KQ402_CheckArmor_03_04: Do you have any papers for that?
DIA_Militia_KQ402_CheckArmor_15_05: I don't. You can go ask him personally or the esteemed Grayson, since it's on his orders that I act.
DIA_Militia_KQ402_CheckArmor_03_06: There's no need. You can come in.
